b: ^ Look boss, there's still a strange guy on this floor!
^ Father Enoch! What a pleasure to meet you again here.

Encounter1: ^But what is this creature? Is this a new trial, oh God?
^The entire Dungeon is a trial, my father, and I am its guardian!
^Hm... It seems I will once again need to put this old body to the test then.
^Wow boss! Did you see those muscles? This priest looks much stronger than expected!
^This promises to be an interesting fight. En garde, priest!
Encounter2: ^You certainly don't intend to spare this old man, do you?
^This guy cannot help but lie, boss! Look at him, not a scratch.
^Don't be ridiculous, I'm just trying to return to the place where that damned ghost snatched me, and I'll do anything for that.
^Interesting. You know, my father, that I do not employ ghosts in the Dungeon; your situation is therefore not my concern.
^I'm afraid we have no choice but to fight then, Dragon...
